body_html:
To misquote Tolstoy -- "Happy training jobs are all alike, every unhappy job is unhappy in its own way."

Async training sometimes gets problems when gradients are too stale -- stale worker arriving with yesterday's gradient can throw the whole procedure into NaN-land
body_text:
To misquote Tolstoy -- "Happy training jobs are all alike, every unhappy job is unhappy in its own way."
Async training sometimes gets problems when gradients are too stale -- stale worker arriving with yesterday's gradient can throw the whole procedure into NaN-land
body:
To misquote Tolstoy -- "Happy training jobs are all alike, every unhappy job is unhappy in its own way." 

Async training sometimes gets problems when gradients are too stale -- stale worker arriving with yesterday's gradient can throw the whole procedure into NaN-land
